animeTitle: Maarui Kanojo to Zannen na Kareshi
otherNames: まぁるい彼女と残念な彼氏
synopsis: The romantic comedy follows Mariko, a plus-sized nurse who loves to eat. Having no love experience, she thinks her life is devoid of love, until she meets a handsome man named Nagi at a group date that she is invited to. Nagi then asks her out on a date.
